author: Chris Roche
content: It was back in the early 80s that the American Johnathan Eberhart a writer on space science and a lead singer with the folk group Boarding Party wrote a song about when sailors would sail and navigate their ships among the stars in his song `Solar Privateer’. It may yet come to pass as he then forecast. My fellow shanty singer Jonathan died of MS some years ago.
